definition: to divide/to separate/to distribute/to allocate/to distinguish (good and bad)/part or subdivision/fraction/one tenth (of certain units)/unit of length equivalent to 0.33 cm/minute (unit of time)/minute (angular measurement unit)/a point (in sports or games)/0.01 yuan (unit of money)
to cover/to wrap/to hold/to include/to take charge of/to contract (to or for)/package/wrapper/container/bag/to hold or embrace/bundle/packet/CL:個|个[ge4],隻|只[zhi1]

sentences.english: There should be no sub-contracting unless previously agreed with the main client.
sentences.chinese: 不该该有任何分包，除非以前与首要客户赞成。

sentences.english: Sub-contracting project will be carried out in authorized laboratory.
sentences.chinese: 分包项目将在认可实验室进行。

sentences.english: Subcontractors will include Lockheed Martin and a number of small businesses.
sentences.chinese: 分包商将包括洛克希德马丁公司和许多小企业。

sentences.english: We can contract to build turn-key plant, undertake single items of projects as a subcontractor or provide labor services.
sentences.chinese: 我们可以承建成套工厂或分包单项工程或供给劳务。

sentences.english: We've sub-contracted the German firm to do the foundations.
sentences.chinese: 我们已经分包给一家德国公司做这个地基。

sentences.english: Provided always that the provision of labor on a piecework basis shall not be deemed to be a subletting under the Clause.
sentences.chinese: 以计件方式提供劳力不得视为是本条所规定的分包。

sentences.english: Modern enterprise plays more and more attention to the management of the sub-contract in primary contractor project.
sentences.chinese: 现代企业越来越重视总承包项目分包合同的管理。

sentences.english: Has the factory audited the sub-contractors for social compliance?
sentences.chinese: 工厂是否已经对分包商进行社会责任审核？

sentences.english: Do you subcontract any professional services to a third party?
sentences.chinese: 贵所是否与第三方签订业务分包合同？

sentences.english: I am looking to bring on one or two more subcontracted designers for ongoing projects.
sentences.chinese: 我希望把一个或两个分包为正在进行的项目设计师。

sentences.english: Y es, we subcontract almost all the joiner work.
sentences.chinese: 时的，我们把所有的细木工舾装都分包出去。

sentences.english: The manufacture of belts and buckles is put out to subcontractor.
sentences.chinese: 成带和带扣的生产，交分包商承做。

sentences.english: In cases where projects are subcontracted to national institutions, FAO offers technical supervision.
sentences.chinese: 如果项目分包给国家机构，粮农组织则进行技术监督。

sentences.english: Are you a preparer or a subcontractor?
sentences.chinese: 你们是加工者或分包商吗？

sentences.english: Bestseller must be informed about all sub-contractors producing Bestseller orders.
sentences.chinese: 行为守则是针对绫致公司所有的供应商和分包商。

sentences.english: Second, bare for is to actually the star role one kind of subpackage .
sentences.chinese: 二是裸替实际是对明星角色的一种分包。

definition: to contract for an entire project
to undertake to perform work within a time limit and according to specifications/to contract for a job/contractor
service (work done for money)/services (as in "goods and services")
to have the full responsibility of a job/allocated task
a system of payment partly in kind and partly in cash
job paid according to the amount of work done/contract work
to be affiliated with/to operate under the wing of/affiliation
